{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=EA8500 |asin=B00UVN21DK |series=AC2600 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=CyberTAN |manuf_model=EWW604 |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router, bridge, range extender, repeater |est_release_date=04/23/2015 |fcc_date=04/10/2015 |fcc_id=Q87-EA8500 |ic_id=3839A-EA8500 |pcb_id=EWW604-B1-L5 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8064 |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G100TFI00 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646Q-BCK0 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 / eSATA (combo port), USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |serial=yes,, internal,, (115200 8N1) |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9980 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9980 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY85405;;4; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, OpenWrt, LEDE |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=LinksysXXXXX, LinksysXXXXX_5GHz |default_ssid_regex=^Linksys[0-9]{5}$, ^Linksys[0-9]{5}_5Ghz$ |default_pass=admin |oui=14:91:82 |oui_eth=14:91:82 }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''800''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''2600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Max-Stream AC2600 MU-MIMO Smart Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA8500/}} (Belkin/Linksys) {{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=EA8500|pid=01t80000003ouh0AAA}} "EWW604-B1-L5 REV:205 (XC)" is silkscreened on the board in the photos. :It's '''CyberTAN''' manufactured [https://web.archive.org/web/20160708012927/www.cybertan.com.tw/Products/EWW604.html EWW604 (via the Wayback Machine)] variant. "EWW604-B1-L5 REV:305 (XD)" is silkscreened on one newer revision unit. *{{WiFiCert|WFA59270|04/14/2015}} {{See also|CyberTAN|Linksys EA7300}} === Reviews === *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32711-linksys-ea8500-max-stream-ac2600-mu-mimo-smart-wi-fi-router-reviewed-part-1 ''Linksys EA8500 Max-Stream AC2600 MU-MIMO Smart Wi-Fi Router
Reviewed - Part 1'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] === Forum threads === *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/linksys-ea8500-max-stream-ac2600-mu-mimo-smart-wi-fi-router-reviewed.24214/ ''Linksys EA8500'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''' forums] === Third-party firmware support notes === Newer units don't have a populated serial header and have newer firmware :which explicitly locks you out from flashing third-party firmware. This necessitates flashing manually via TFTP in U-Boot (see [http://mrjcd.com/EA8500_DD-WRT/ here]). ===See also=== :[[List of Four Stream Hardware]] *[[ASRock G10]] *[[Linksys E8350]] *[[Linksys EA9200]] *[[Netgear R7500]] *[[Netgear R7500v2]] __NOTOC__
